item.description:
OK, Let's try this again. Sorry for yesterday's confusion but I had a scheduling conflict that I was unaware of when I made the initial event posting. So let's meet at Nellie Greens on the Branford Waterfront at 7pm for food, drinks, and a good time. I will schedule this for 7PM but if you just want to join us for drinks - then come on over after 8PM and don't worry about the event being overbooked - at that point it won't matter. I've never been to Nellies but hear good things about it - nothing fancy or elegant - just casual fun. Here's a link:
http://www.nelliegree...
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for the dining out group

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Nellie Greens - Take Two
